title: Riot Point Card.
body:
Just purchased a riot point card to use on my account but when i try go into ''Purchase RP'' to enter my code it doesnt load for 3 minutes or so and comes back with this message?

Failed to load URL "https://plstore.oc1.lol.riotgames.com/session/new/" with error "unknown error code -118" (-118).

is there any other way i can put these points onto my account? if not when will this be fixed.

EDIT: ALL SORTED

replies.body: Glad to hear you got it sorted out. Don't hesitate to reach out if you run into any other problems!
